title: ANTI-SRILANKA  DMDK WANTS TAMIL OFFICIAL LANGUAGE IN TAMIL NADU BUT FAILS TO SEE IT ALREADY OFFICIAL LANGUAGE IN SRI LANKA
content: Onlanka News – by Walter Jayawardhana The Desiya Murpokku Dravida Kazhagam (DMDK) led by actor Vijayakant has decided to boycott the Indian Presidential elections on the ground of many issues out of which two are  Sri Lanka issues….
